website_summaries.verdict: A promotional Tapu Koko card and pin, plus a wide mixture of great cards is a steal for Island Guardian fans.
pros: Legendary Tapu Koko card is a powerhouse, and may include other rare and strong cards, such as Yanmega BREAK, Clawitzer BREAK, or the TCG debut of Volcanion
cons: One of the booster packs is from an older X&Y set

customer_reviews.title: Great promo card with good booster packs. And a pin!
customer_reviews.text: Includes Tapu Koko SM31, 2x Guardians Rising booster packs, 1x Steam Siege booster pack, and a Tapu Koko pin. Tapu Koko is a competitively viable card selling on the secondary market for ~$6 at the time I am writing this. Getting two chances to pull Tapu Lele GX (and a pin!!?!), wow, great product. Tapu Koko SM31 is functionally equivalent to Tapu Koko SM30 found in, the art is different, and SM30 has the "galaxy" holo pattern over the entire card whereas SM31 only has it over the character image. Just FYI, both collections are great.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Can't be more happy with the results. I ordered it for the pin and promo card. The 3 packs where great. There was a wishiwashi secret rare and a steelix mega. Easily worth the money. I can sell the wishiwashi for $13 easy online. Pays for the whole package. I already have one, but if I didn't I would just keep it. I know it's luck of the draw with these purchases, but this was great. The mimiku pin set was equally as good.
customer_reviews.author: Troy M.

customer_reviews.title: Potentially good value if the promo card doesn't come with a defect.
customer_reviews.text: The current price at half the original MSRP makes this theoretically a good value for three packs, a game-relevant promo, and a pin. Steam Siege is not as exciting as other currently Standard expansions, but at least it's not Evolutions. And the two Guardians Rising packs got me some staples I was looking for for my deck. Tapu Koko is a very desirable, playable promo compared to some other pin collection promos. However, my copy came straight out of the plastic blister horribly warped, and cut so off center that the inner image area almost touches the bottom edge of the card. Especially because of the curve, it's simply unplayable. What a failure of QC on the manufacturer's part.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon TCG Tapu Koko Pin collection set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Pokémon Tapu Koko Pin collection set for my youngest daughter. she likes to collect pokemon cards, so I thought she would enjoy this collector's set.
customer_reviews.author: spiderman88

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These pin packs are perfect and if there's ever any issues, the seller is super fast to respond and fix it! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pack!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gift for a 9 year old! Love the pins and got some great cards from it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: I understand foil cards can do this when exposed to air but this was bad. I believe non-playable since it does not lay ...
customer_reviews.text: The promo card "tapu koko" was really warped out of shape. I understand foil cards can do this when exposed to air but this was bad. I believe non-playable since it does not lay flat. Box looks like in good condition however. When shopping in store I usually choose the one box with the promo that seen better days and still its front slot and not loose in the box but i could not pass on the amazon deal. :) I guess get what i paid.
customer_reviews.author: madhardy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Overall great card pack. My son loves pokemon cards and collects the pins as well.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin N.

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon Cards
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to receive! Loved and surprised by the "good cards"!!

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: As described :) but not a good set of Pokémon cards

customer_reviews.title: Tampered
customer_reviews.text: Tampered. One booster pack was nearly opened and contained 11 cards instead of 10. I bought two of these and no GXs or anything worthwhile.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the koko figure but only can afford the pin? this is your option

customer_reviews.title: You must think ppl are stupid!!
customer_reviews.text: You must think ppl are stupid!!!!!!!!!! These packs were all resealed!!!!!! Glue rubbing off the sealed part of the packs. I only opened one pack only, I'm going to try and get my money back. WTF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great box for a cheap price!! Cool pin and lucky pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Lira

customer_reviews.title: I pulled a secret rare from this box!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Tapo Koko box! Believe it or not, I pulled a secret rare (gold lighting energy) out of my box. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: price of the Promo and code will increase in time
customer_reviews.text: Didn't pull a GX or EX, but at least the Promo is is worth $5, $2 for the code and the pin $3 the price of the Promo and code will increase in time not decrease since it's a VERY playable card...
customer_reviews.author: 2000robot

customer_reviews.title: Damaged outer box
customer_reviews.text: Product came with minor damage to the outside of the box and bended promo. Everything else was good.
customer_reviews.author: echosoulTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Grandson should enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Product looks like it will work for my grandson. He’s a big Pokémon fan like other kids. Nothing inside the package looks damaged but the box was torn in a couple of areas and one corner of the box was crushed. Maybe should ship in a box instead of plastic envelope.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: I saw so much glue at the top of the packs
customer_reviews.text: High chance it has been tempered with. I got this only because of the low price and I was really disappointed to see the packs with glue coming out of them at the top.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

product_meta.title: Pokemon TCG Tapu Koko Pin Collection Card Game
feature_bullets: PROTECT THE ISLANDS - Tapu Koko is the guardian deity of of Melemele Island, and one of the Alolan Islands 4 guardian deities. Guard the islands and complete your deck with Tapu Koko's dazzling mix of Electric type & Fairy type!
EXCLUSIVE FOIL - Get your hands on this fully playable Tapu Koko promotional holofoil card. Features Flying Flip attack that can damage benched Pokemon and 100 damage Electric Ball attack.

GREAT VALUE - This Sun & Moon Premium Collection includes 3 random booster packs for various expansions of Pokemon TCG. Save money when you bundle them together...who knows what new rare card you'll pull?
COLLECTOR'S PIN - For fans of Tapu Koko and the Alolan Guardian Deities you can grab your exclusive high quality Tapu Koko pin featuring vibrant colors and awesome artwork.
GOTTA CATCH 'EM ALL! Round out your collection and become the ultimate Pokemon Master with this amazing Collector's Set and other Premium Collections and Trading Card sets.
